DOC.brief_summary: Coordinated project whose objective : ) ass effectiveness physical activity intervention ( MOVI-KIDS ) prevent obesity improve fitness adiposity rebound period ; b ) examine effectiveness MOVI-KIDS reduce carotid intima-media thickness .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Physical Activity Intervention Preventing Obesity During Adiposity Rebound Period .
DOC.detailed_description: The prevalence overweight Spanish child puberty age among high world increase quickly . Our group do far two intervention base after-school program recreational physical activity control obesity cardiovascular risk factor primary school child ( 8-to-11 year ) Cuenca , Spain . The first edition , call MOVI , show moderate effect reduce adiposity improve lipid profile , significantly improve overall cardiometabolic risk , mainly reduce blood insulin level . A second edition ( MOVI-2 ) , increased duration intensity session focus increased muscle strength . Preliminary analysis also show decrease body fat , reduction global cardiometabolic decrease insulin level . Our project integrate multidimensional intervention promote physical activity , mixed design ( cross-over randomize trial , qualitative study ) consist two sub-projects share study population : `` Effectiveness intervention physical activity promotion schoolchildren prevent obesity adiposity rebound period : cross-over randomized cluster trial '' `` Effectiveness physical activity intervention prevent obesity improve academic performance child without ADHD risk '' . The two intervention base cross-over randomized trial aim test effectiveness intervention promote physical activity school environment ( MOVI-KIDS ) two-years 22 school ( 20 public two private school ) province Cuenca Ciudad Real , Spain . This principal subproject consist mixed study include trial cite nested qualitative study aim identify barrier facilitator physical activity child school environment ( social family factor , urban planning , etc . ) , produce knowledge perception child , parent teacher improve condition physical social environment facilitate physical activity . The hypothesis third edition multidimensional intervention promote physical activity child adiposity rebound period ( 4-7 year ) , school environment ( MOVI-KIDS ) , last two-years , : 1 . Reduce body fat percentage intervention group versus control group 2 % . 2 . Improve several component fitness : aerobic capacity , strength , speed agility . 3 . Reduce carotid intima-media thickness 4 . Reduce fat , increase fat free mass , reduce sedentary behavior .
DOC.criteria: Schools least one full course 3rd early childhood education one 1st primary school . The Boards Governors ( community participatory organ school ) give approval intervention measurement begin end course . Children 4 7 year old . Children 's parents/caregivers give write consent child 's participation . Collaboration family respond questionnaire family leisure habit , sleeping , eating , get around town , etc. , include measurement protocol project . Have malformation prevents learn Spanish language ( Spanish sign language ) . Have kind physical mental disorder identify parent teacher prevent physical activity . Have chronic illness heart disease , diabetes asthma , determine pediatrician/family doctor analysis activity program prevents participation .
